类型: Color: Tie Dye Punk Fingerless Japanese Anime Gloves
评论详情: They're slightly tighter fitting than the product photos, and the thumb hole was way too small (in my photo, I cut it larger myself- it was about half that size). The color is a good vivid red, and the fabric is thin but not super cheap looking. The sleeves also seem slightly shorter than the product photos, but I have long arms so it may just be that.

类型: Color: Grunge Arm Sleeve Mesh Fingerless Arm Warmer

评论概述: Not red, thumbhole in wrong place
类型: Color: Tie Dye Punk Fingerless Japanese Anime Gloves
评论详情: The photos are misleading. It looks like these are a bright full red, but instead are a pale faded red (my 2nd pic shows the color more accurately). Which means you can't wear them with anything that's actually red bc it's obvious they're not really red.  Also, the thumbhole is just cut as a slit into the fabric - which means the edges of the hole are going to stretch out and roll - instead of being made on the side seam like most arm warmers. The hole is also too small on top of all that.  Loved the way these were supposed to look, but these are going back. I say save your $ and DIY these yourself with some bleach and RIT dye. You'll probably get better results.
